attributes.action: Support the motion to keep ''Iconic brands'' of Cadbury and Bournville to remain under British ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Birmingham MPs have tabled a House of Commons motion calling for the "iconic brands" of Cadbury and Bournville to remain under British ownership. (BBC News 10th November). 

The modern era of globalisation represents unprecedented challenges when it comes to sustaining culture, heritage and identity; not even a chocolate bar is safe. 

Please sign to show support for the above motion, sign to keep the jobs here in the mighty GB, to keep the chocolate fingers tasting as good as they do and to help us proud Brits from loosing an iconic brand into the abyss.
